name: Just Straight Up Pong
description:
This is my submission for the MiniLD #58 competition. To fit the theme of "Pong", I made a very simple 2D Pong clone. This was my evening project so I had very little time to work on it, but I think it came out okay. It's written using no libraries, just raw Javascript and the HTML5 canvas.

Note that your browser must support HTML5 in order for the game to work. If your browser does not support HTML5, please consider downloading the latest version of Google Chrome or Firefox.
